Calendar

The 2020 Formula 1 season has been disrupted by the global pandemic. The races included in this year’s competition are still up in the air, but the calendar so far is below.

The disrupted 2020 season will not include the new Vietnam Grand Prix or the returning Dutch Grand Prix.

The next race is the held in on the .

Below is the calendar of races that have been confirmed so far for the 2020 Formula 1 season:

Drivers

Learn about the 20 drivers competing in the 2020 Formula 1 championship including Lewis Hamilton, the defending World Drivers' Champion, who is looking to win his 6th championship this year.

Teams

Find out more about the 10 teams competing for the World Constructors' Championship. Mercedes are the reigning champions, and they face fierce competition from the likes of Ferrari and Red Bull.
